page.title: 18Shopping Facilities
page.content: Next to the main street is a small pedestrian precinct containing a Newsagent, a Hairdressing shop, a take-away Fish and Chip shop, and a Greengrocer. Further shopping facilities are provided by a Supermarket and a Bakery at the North- eastern end of the main street, a Post Office/General Store in The Street and a Supermarket on Maldon Road. Non- food shops include a Licensed Betting Shop and a Wood-Stove Dealer but there are also general shops which reflect the current interest in home care and home improvement - a Ceramic Tile Centre, Kitchen Planning Centre, Fireplace Design and Construction, a Reproduction Furniture maker and 2 Antique dealers. Two garages in The Street sell petrol and service vehicles, one selling bicycles and accessories,the other selling cars.
